casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Appeal of: HIGHWATER SOLAR 1, LLC, Appellant No. COA18-396 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 20, 2018

--------

From the decision of the Wayne County Board of Equalization and Review 1 to deny the partial exclusion of certain personal property for tax year 2016

AFFIRMED.

1 We note that the appeal to the North Carolina Property Tax Commission was from the decision of the Wayne County Board of Commissioners.
